channel.title: Bouncing Tor Browser icon (green earth) won't stop bouncing sometimes?
channel.description:
I noticed that when I open an app on the workstation that the app will have a smaller icon bounce once or twice then stop bouncing when the app is open. However, with the tor browser sometimes the green earth tor logo will keep bouncing through my entire Internet session and won't stop until I restart the gateway. Then other times it won't bounce at all. I am easily spooked due to lack of knowledge so I have been restarting workstation when this happens. Just curious if it happens to anyone else and what it could mean? Why does it happen some times and not others?
Thanks

item.title: Bouncing Tor Browser icon (green earth) won't stop bouncing sometimes?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
So there must be something wrong with the existing desktop icon. The one
on the desktop, I suppose? Just delete it and create a new one.

Read full topic
item.source: Bouncing Tor Browser icon (green earth) won't stop bouncing sometimes?

item.title: Bouncing Tor Browser icon (green earth) won't stop bouncing sometimes?
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
oh , wow Tor browser opened without bouncing icon.

just went to usr/share/applications and pressed double click on anondist-torbrowser.desktop Tor browser opened normally. so as if u press double click on janondisttorbrowser.desktop.

i dunno how, but it solved the issue.

Read full topic
item.source: Bouncing Tor Browser icon (green earth) won't stop bouncing sometimes?

item.title: Bouncing Tor Browser icon (green earth) won't stop bouncing sometimes?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Can you check please, that your shortcut leads to /usr/share/applications/anondist-torbrowser.desktop or /usr/share/applications/janondisttorbrowser.desktop? I think it could just be a stale shortcut. Otherwise please try going to /usr/share/applications/ and starting anondist-torbrowser.desktop manually. Remove the old shortcut and create a new one.

Read full topic
item.source: Bouncing Tor Browser icon (green earth) won't stop bouncing sometimes?

item.title: Bouncing Tor Browser icon (green earth) won't stop bouncing sometimes?
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
upgraded version. stable repository.

same as with KVM

item.source: Bouncing Tor Browser icon (green earth) won't stop bouncing sometimes?

item.title: Bouncing Tor Browser icon (green earth) won't stop bouncing sometimes?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
It shouldn’t happen at all. Even without system wise lauch feedback settings.
For the Tor Browser [desktop file] starter, launch feedback is disabled.

github.com

Whonix/tb-starter/blob/037c90bf19896ad8503b74345a6678de01c34b2e/usr/share/applications/janondisttorbrowser.desktop#L13

    

  1. ## See the file COPYING for copying conditions.
    2. 

  2. 

    3. 

  3. [Desktop Entry]
    4. 

  4. Exec=torbrowser %u
    5. 

  5. Type=Application
    6. 

  6. Name=Tor Browser (AnonDist)
    7. 

  7. GenericName=Privacy Browser
    8. 

  8. Comment=Start Tor Browser (AnonDist)
    9. 

  9. Categories=Network;
    10. 

  10. Icon=/usr/share/icons/anon-icon-pack/torbrowser.png
    11. 

  11. X-KDE-StartupNotify=false
    12. 

  12. Keywords=browser;privacy;Tor;
    13. 

  13. MimeType=text/html;text/xml;application/xhtml+xml;application/xml;application/vnd.mozilla.xul+xml;application/rss+xml;application/rdf+xml;image/gif;image/jpeg;image/png;x-scheme-handler/http;x-scheme-handler/https;
    14.

Can you check please, that your shortcut leads to /usr/share/applications/anondist-torbrowser.desktop or /usr/share/applications/janondisttorbrowser.desktop? I think it could just be a stale shortcut. Otherwise please try going to /usr/share/applications/ and starting anondist-torbrowser.desktop manually. Remove the old shortcut and create a new one.

Read full topic
item.source: Bouncing Tor Browser icon (green earth) won't stop bouncing sometimes?

item.title: Bouncing Tor Browser icon (green earth) won't stop bouncing sometimes?
item.dc:creator: troubadour
item.description:
It did happen a couple of times. The KDE launch feedback can be adjusted in

If I remember correctly, reducing the “Startup indication timeout” cleared the problem.

Happens for me in Whonix 12.0.0.3.2 RC also.

In an upgraded version or fresh Whonix 12?

item.source: Bouncing Tor Browser icon (green earth) won't stop bouncing sometimes?

item.title: Bouncing Tor Browser icon (green earth) won't stop bouncing sometimes?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Unrelated to security. I haven’t heard this before. Usually launch feedback stops after one minute or so. I don’t think it’s related to being online or offline. I don’t think it would affect if Whonix-Gateway is started or not.

“Tor app” in inconcise. -> Tor Browser

Read full topic
item.source: Bouncing Tor Browser icon (green earth) won't stop bouncing sometimes?

item.title: Bouncing Tor Browser icon (green earth) won't stop bouncing sometimes?
item.dc:creator: new2this
item.description:
No ego I meant starting the workstation where the app is located stops the bouncing.

Please advise if I am the only one this is happening to and if it means anything as far as safety of my Internet connection to Tor when it happens.

Read full topic
item.source: Bouncing Tor Browser icon (green earth) won't stop bouncing sometimes?

item.title: Bouncing Tor Browser icon (green earth) won't stop bouncing sometimes?
item.dc:creator: new2this
item.description:
No my whonix is up to date as far as Whonix Build Version: 11.0.0.3.0. I know whatever app I open will bounce a few times and then stop. The only one that won’t stop bouncing is the Tor app. It will continue bouncing the entire time I am online. It gets annoying so I restart the workstation and it goes away. Does this happen to anyone else??

Read full topic
item.source: Bouncing Tor Browser icon (green earth) won't stop bouncing sometimes?

item.title: Bouncing Tor Browser icon (green earth) won't stop bouncing sometimes?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Old version of Whonix? What Whonix version are you using?

It’s called KDE launch feedback. KDE makes the icon bounce as long as it got feedback from the application that it finished launching.

Read full topic
item.source: Bouncing Tor Browser icon (green earth) won't stop bouncing sometimes?

item.title: Bouncing Tor Browser icon (green earth) won't stop bouncing sometimes?
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

wait a minute, so restarting the gateway, stop the “bouncing” inside the workstation? Or did you mean restarting the workstation, because that would make far more sense.

Have a nice day,

Ego
